topic: Confirmation of Bachelor Degree Completion and Grade Entry

correspondence.message: I have just graduated with a Bachelor degree in Information Systems and need to know if my grades can be entered this week. I also want confirmation that I have completed all 180 credits for my degree."

If you are starting your Master's program at TUM, the service office will notify the admission's office once your grades are entered, so you do not need a separate document. For more details, visit the following link: https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studierende/abschlussarbeit-abschluss/informatik/ --> Ãœbergang Bachelor zu Master. If you are enrolling at a different university, contact the examination board for confirmation.
